ST12-001.name: Roronoa Zoro & Sanji ST12-001
ST12-001.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] You may return 1 of your Characters with a cost of 2 or more to the owner's hand: Set up to 1 of your Characters with 7000 power or less as active.

ST12-002.name: Kuina ST12-002
ST12-002.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less. [Trigger] Play this card.

ST12-003.name: Dracule Mihawk ST12-003
group: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
ST12-003.effect: [On Play] If you have 2 or less Characters, play up to 1 {Muggy Kingdom} type or <Slash> attribute Character card with a cost of 4 or less other than [Dracule Mihawk] from your hand rested.

ST12-006.name: Yosaku & Johnny ST12-006
ST12-006.effect:
[DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Choose one:
• Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.
• K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

ST12-007.name: Rika ST12-007
ST12-007.effect: [On Play] ➁ If your opponent has 3 or more Life cards, set up to 1 of your <Slash> attribute Characters with a cost of 4 or less as active.

ST12-008.name: Roronoa Zoro ST12-008
ST12-008.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less.

ST12-010.name: Emporio Ivankov ST12-010
ST12-010.effect: [On Play] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck and play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2. Then, place the rest at the top or bottom of your deck. [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] Draw 1 card if you have 6 or less cards in your hand.

ST12-011.name: Sanji ST12-011
ST12-011.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] If you have 5 or less cards in your hand, this Character gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn.

ST12-012.name: Charlotte Pudding ST12-012
ST12-012.effect: [Activate: Main] Return this Character to the owner's hand.

ST12-013.name: Zeff ST12-013
ST12-013.effect: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order. [When Attacking] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck and play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 rested. Then, place the rest at the top or bottom of your deck.

ST12-014.name: Duval ST12-014
ST12-014.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

ST12-016.name: Lion Strike ST12-016
ST12-016.effect: [Main]/[Counter] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards with a cost of 4 or less. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

ST12-017.name: Plastic Surgery Shot ST12-017
ST12-017.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, reveal 1 card from the top of your deck, play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2, and place the rest at the top or bottom of your deck.
